summary: Comprehensive testing of gamification system completed successfully. All backend APIs working (31/31 tests passed) and frontend challenges page fully functional with French interface.
passed_tests: Backend: All 6 gamification endpoints (profile, checkin, challenges, leaderboard, hall-of-fame, achievements)
Frontend: User registration and authentication flow
Frontend: Challenges page loads with proper French interface
Frontend: Profile section shows level, XP, streak, badges correctly
Frontend: Check-in button works and updates XP (0â†’10 XP observed)
Frontend: All 4 tabs functional (Challenges, Leaderboard, Hall of Fame, Badges)
Frontend: Challenges display with proper French labels and progress tracking
Frontend: Leaderboard shows rankings with period filters
Frontend: Achievements section shows earned vs locked badges
API Integration: Frontend successfully communicates with backend
